item.title: Need any coder's help as soon as possible!
item.dc:creator: @arcane-scape arcane-scape
item.description:
@arcane-scape wrote:

i would liek to ask for help,

[code] // implemented Constants (changed Constants to interface) -bakatool
public long lastDeath = 0, lastAction = 0, lastClick = 0;
public long lastPacket = 0, deathTime = 0;
public int m4001 = 0;
public int m4002 = 0;
public int m4003 = 0;
public int m4004 = 0;
public int m4005 = 0;
public int m4006 = 0;
public int m4007 = 0;
// set to true if char did teleport in this cycle
public boolean mapRegionDidChange = false;
public int mapRegionX, mapRegionY;
protected boolean mask100update = false;
public int mask100var1 = 0;
public int mask100var2 = 0;
protected boolean mask1update = false;
public int mask1var = 0;
protected boolean mask400update = false;
public int maxItemAmount = /* 2147000000*/2147000000;
public String md5pass = “”, playerSalt = “”;
public boolean[] MustDelete = new boolean[ItemHandler.MaxDropItems];

public int MyShopID = 0;
protected int NewHP = 135;
public boolean newhptype = false;

public int NpcDialogue = 0;

public boolean NpcDialogueSend = false;

public int npcId;[/code]

I NEED HELP WITH this, what do i need to do to my player.java, when i try to compile, it sais

"player.java:917: illegal start of type
public int MaxItemAmount = /2147000000/2147000000;
↑

1 error
Files compiled succesfully!

PLEASE HELP ME FAST AS POSSIBLE

Read full topic
